meanings.sent1: The group of kayakers paddled down the river together.
meanings.sent2: Many kayakers enjoy exploring different waterways.
meanings.sent3: The kayakers raced each other to the finish line, laughing all the way.
meanings.sent4: The kayakers navigated through the rough waters of life with skill and determination.
meanings.sent5: The colorful kayakers stood out against the serene backdrop of the lake.

meanings.definition: Those who participate in the sport of kayaking.
meanings.sent1: A community of kayakers gathered for a weekend adventure.
meanings.sent2: The kayakers prepared their gear before heading out on the water.
meanings.sent3: The kayakers celebrated their successful trip with a picnic by the shore.
meanings.sent4: The kayakers embraced the challenges of the river, growing stronger with each paddle.
meanings.sent5: The determined kayakers pushed themselves to reach new heights in their sport.
